alert.note: Alert for Grand Staircase; Mojave Desert (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 09 at 3:22PM MDT until June 13 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 497 AND 498... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Sunday morning through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 497 Mojave Desert and Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts in excess of 40 mph Sunday afternoon and evening, and again Monday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Afternoon relative humidity falling into the 7 to 10 percent range, with marginal overnight recovery of only 20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.
